A Pokémon XG save file could not be
created![Clear Window]Please insert a Memory Card into Slot A.[Dialogue End]

A Pokémon XG save file could not
be created![Clear Window]The Memory Card in Slot A is corrupted
and must be formatted.[Clear Window]Formatting will delete all saved data
on the Memory Card.
Would you like to format the Memory
Card?

A Pokémon XG save file could not be
created![Clear Window]There is no Memory Card in Slot A.[Dialogue End]

A Pokémon XG save file could not
be created![Clear Window]The device in Slot A is not supported.
Please insert a Memory Card.[Dialogue End]

There is insufficient free space on
the Memory Card in Slot A to create a
save file.[Clear Window]Pokémon XG requires at least 1 file and
43 blocks to create a save file.[Clear Window]Please manage data on the Memory Card
using the Nintendo Gamecube Memory
Card Screen.[Dialogue End]

Saving during a new game will delete the
current save file on the Memory Card in
Slot A. Is that okay?

There is no Pokémon XG save file on
the Memory Card in Slot A.[Clear Window]Would you like to create a new save file?

There is no Pokémon XG save file on
the Memory Card in Slot A.[Clear Window]Would you like to create a new save file?
[7]{01}Would you like to save your progress?
Save failed![Clear Window]There is no Memory Card in Slot A.[Dialogue End]

The Memory Card in Slot A is corrupted
and must be formatted.[Clear Window]Formatting will delete all saved data on
the Memory Card.
Would you like to format the Memory
Card?

The Memory Card in Slot A is not
consistent with the save file used to
start the game. Data cannot be saved.[Dialogue End]

The Pokémon XG save file on the Memory
Card in Slot A is corrupted and needs to
be deleted.[Dialogue End]

The device in Slot A is not supported!
Please insert a Memory Card.[Dialogue End]

The Memory Card in Slot A does not
contain Story Mode saved data to
continue from![Dialogue End]

There is no Story Mode save data on the
Memory Card in Slot A![Dialogue End]

Connect a Game Boy Advance system with
a GBA Pokémon Game Pak to Controller
Socket [Quantity 47] using a GCN-GBA cable and turn
on the power.[Dialogue End]

Checking connection to Controller
Socket [Quantity 47]...[Dialogue End]

Connection failed!
Please check that all connections are
made properly.[Clear Window]Please turn off the Game Boy Advance
system connected to Controller Socket [Quantity 47].[Dialogue End]

Connection failed![Clear Window]Please check that the GCN-GBA cable
is properly connected, and the GBA
Pokémon Game Pak is properly inserted
in the Game Boy Advance system.[Clear Window]Please turn off the Game Boy Advance
system connected to Controller Socket [Quantity 47].[Dialogue End]

The GBA Pokémon Game Pak has not
been saved properly![Clear Window]Please turn off the Game Boy Advance

from the Controller Socket.[Clear Window]Please restart the GBA Pokémon game
and save at any Pokémon Center.[Dialogue End]

To continue Story Mode, please set the
language to English in the Options menu
as originally saved.[Dialogue End]

To continue Story Mode, please set the

Each Trainer sends out one Pokémon at

To switch party Pokémon, choose
